summary: The module implements a collection of static analysis checks for OpenAPI version 2 specifications. It provides a shared base class and a range of concrete validators that examine global and path-level scheme definitions, security scheme configurations (including OAuth2 flows and Basic Auth), security requirement references, and operation object attributes such as consumes/produces media types and security scopes.
business_intent: Enable automated verification that OpenAPI v2 API definitions adhere to security best practices and proper configuration standards, helping developers detect missing or misconfigured authentication schemes, undefined scopes, and incomplete media type specifications to improve API security and reliability.
